property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on one of your Cyber Lord. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw 3 cards. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Vortex Evolution: Put on 2 of any combination of Angel Command and/or Armored Dragon. When this creature is put into the battle zone, you may cast one light or fire spell from your hand without paying its mana cost. When this creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, choose any number of your opponent's creatures with a total power of 6000 or less and destroy them. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Vortex Evolution: Put on 1 of your darkness creatures and 1 of your fire creatures. Double Breaker Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into his graveyard instead. When this creature leaves the battle zone, your opponent chooses 2 cards from their hand and discards them. Then, you may choose 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone and put them in its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Double Breaker When one of your opponent's creatures attacks you, your opponent may tap a number of cards equal to the number of civilizations NOT in their mana zone. If they don't, the attack is stopped. (The attacking creature remains tapped.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. All of your shields that are returned to your hand gain "Shield Trigger". Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each linked god in your battle zone, you may reduce this spell's casting cost by as much as 3. It can't cost less than 1. Destroy all creatures except God creatures.

card.name: Infinity Phoenix, Phoenix of the Dragon Flame

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vortex Evolution: Put on 2 of your fire creatures. All of your Dragon and Phoenix may attack untapped creatures. When this creature leaves the battle zone, you may return any number of fire creatures from your graveyard and/or mana zone. Then, return this creature to your deck and shuffle it. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, this creature can't be chosen. (It can still be attacked and blocked.) This creature breaks an additional shield for each card linked with this one. God Link - Flame Agon, God of Flames (Right Side) or Shine Valkyrie, Heavenly God (Left Side)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the battle zone, search your deck. You may choose one card from it and put it in your mana zone. If you do, put one card from your mana zone into your graveyard and put 1 non-evolution Wild Veggies not named Baron Gouyama into the battle zone from your mana zone. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Evolution: Put on one of your multicolored creatures. Your opponent can't cast spells other than multicolored spells. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature gets +4000 power each civilization in your mana zone. When this creature has 6000 or more power it gains "Double Breaker". When this creature has 15000 or more power it gains "Triple Breaker". When this creature has 20000 or more power it gains "Quadruple Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on one of your Dragons. This creature can't be blocked. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker Whenever one of your Dragon creatures is destroyed, you may draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature attacks, for each card linked with this one your opponent destroys one of their creatures and puts one card from their mana zone into their graveyard. When this creature is destroyed, return 1 other God from graveyard to your hand. God Link - Blue Poseidon, Sea God (Right Side) or Flame Agon, God of Flames (Left Side)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Civilization Breaker (This creature breaks 1 shield for each civilization in your mana zone.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When one of your Dragon attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Dragon add it to your hand. If it isn't a Dragon, put it into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put 1 non-evolution creature from your mana zone into the battle zone. Then, choose 1 non-evolution from your opponent's mana zone and put it into their battle zone. Then, choose 1 of your creatures and 1 of your opponent's creatures and put them in their respective owner's mana zones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players. Overdrive Darkness x1 + Fire x1 + Nature x1 (When this creature is summoned, you may tap an additional 1 Darkness, 1 Fire, and 1 Nature card in your mana zone. If you do, this creature gains the following [OD] ability). [OD]: When this creature is put into the battle zone, if the opponent has more cards in their hand than you have in yours, you may draw until you have the same number of cards they do.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. You may have your Dragon creatures cost 1 less. They can't cost less than 1. When your Bolmeteus Samurai Dragon attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. This creature can't attack creatures. This creature can't be blocked. This creature can't be attacked. When this creature attacks, search your deck. You may choose a creature from it, show it to your opponent, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Power Attacker +2000 Overdrive Light x1 + Water x1 + Nature x1 (When this creature is summoned, you may tap an additional 1 Light, 1 Water, and 1 Nature card in your mana zone. If you do, this creature gains the following [OD] ability). [OD]: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your opponent's tapped creatures or break 1 of your opponent's shields with this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. You can put an evolution creature of any race on this creature. When this creature is destroyed, you may put a Dragon from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. When this creature attacks, you may tap one card each of light, water, darkness, fire, and nature in your mana zone. If you do, tap all your opponent's creatures and put one of your opponent's shields into its owner's graveyard. (Choose what to attack before tapping.) Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its [Tap] ability. [Tap]: Search your deck. You may choose one God from it that can link with a God in your battle zone, put it into the battle zone, and link it with that God. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Add the top card of your deck to your shields. Destroy 1 of your opponent's non-multicolored creatures. Your opponent chooses 2 non-multicolored cards in their mana zone and puts them in the graveyard. Search your deck. You may choose 1 multicolored creature from it, show it to your opponent, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker God Link - Emerald Pharaoh, Earth God (Right Side) or Blue Poseidon, Sea God (Left Side) When this creature is linked with a God, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a creature with a cost less than or equal to the number of civilizations in your mana zone is destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature can't be blocked. When you draw at the beginning of your turn, you may draw an additional card for each card linked to this one. God Link - Shine Valkyrie, Heavenly God (Right Side) or Dark Indora, God of Darkness (Left Side)

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack. When this creature is put into the battle zone, for each civilization your have in your mana zone you may look at 1 card from the top of your deck. Add 1 of these to your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures. For each civilization you have in your mana zone, that creature gets -1000 power during this turn. (A creature with 0 or less power is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Your opponent chooses 1 card from their hand and discards it. If the discarded card shares a civilization with a card in your mana zone, your opponent chooses 1 card from his mana zone and puts it in their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature can attack untapped creatures. This creature gets "Power Attacker +2000" for each card linked to this one. God Link - Dark Indora, God of Darkness (Right Side) or Emerald Pharaoh, Earth God (Left Side)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Destroy one of your opponent's creatures with 5000 power or less. If you have at least one Bolmeteus Samurai Dragon in your battle zone, destroy 1 more of your opponent's creatures with 5000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When this creature is put into the battle zone, search your deck. You may choose a creature from it with a cost less than or equal to the number of civilizations in your mana zone, show it to your opponent, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put the top 5 cards from your deck into your mana zone. Then, put 5 cards from your mana zone into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. When this creature is put into the battle zone, you may tap 1 of your opponent's creatures. When this creature attacks, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. When this creature is put into the battle zone, choose 1 of your creatures. That creature gets +1000 power for each civilization you have in your mana zone during this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Overdrive Light x1 + Fire x1 + Nature x1 (When this creature is summoned, you may tap an additional 1 Light, 1 Fire, and 1 Nature card in your mana zone. If you do, this creature gains the following [OD] ability). [OD]: When this creature is put into the battle zone, return 1 creature in the battle zone to its owner's hand. Then, return one creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. When you cast spells, you may have them cost 1 less. They can't cost less than 1. When this creature is destroyed, discard 1 card from your opponent's hand at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Overdrive Light x1 + Water x1 + Darkness x1 (When this creature is summoned, you may tap an additional 1 Light, 1 Water, and 1 Darkness card in your mana zone. If you do, this creature gains the following [OD] ability). [OD]: When this creature is put into the battle zone, all of your other creatures gain "Power Attacker +3000" until the end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker When this creature is put into the battle zone, tap all of your opponent's creatures with "Blocker". This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players. When this creature is destroyed, no other creatures may attack this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one of your opponent's creature's in the battle zone and tap it. If you have more civilizations in your mana zone than your opponent, you may return 1 spell from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When this creature is put into the battle zone, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put in the battle zone, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack. When this creature blocks, after the battle return the blocked creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the battle zone, you may draw 1 card for each civilization you have in your mana zone. Then, put the same number of cards you drew on the bottom of the deck, in any order, from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the battle zone, you may destroy 1 of your opponent's untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack. All of your multicolored creatures gain "Slayer".

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your Dragon creatures are destroyed, you may destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy 1 of your opponent's untapped creatures. If you have at least 1 card in your mana zone that shares a civilization with the destroyed creature, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the battle zone, you may destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with 2000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Power Attacker +2000 This creature must attack each turn, if possible.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures with 3000 power or less. If you have all of the civilizations in your mana zone, destroy 1 more creature with 3000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponent can't use the "Shield Trigger" of shields this creature breaks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may reduce the summoning cost of the 2nd creature summoned during your turn by as much as 2. It can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If you have all of the civilizations in your mana zone, put 1 more card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Overdrive Water x1 + Darkness x1 + Fire x1 (When this creature is summoned, you may tap an additional 1 Water, 1 Darkness, and 1 Fire card in your mana zone. If you do, this creature gains the following [OD] ability). [OD]: When this creature is put into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone, and you may return 1 card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Triple Breaker
